description: The GSOD or Global Surface Summary of the Day (GSOD) data provided by the US National Climatic Data Center (NCDC) are a valuable source of weather data with global coverage. However, the data files are cumbersome and difficult to work with. The GSODR package aims to make it easy to find, transfer and format the data you need for use in analysis.
title: GSODR
